message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $180 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand that $180 is a bit high, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $155. This is my final offer for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $145, which is the lowest I can go.
I understand that you're willing to meet me at $145, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product.
I'm not going to go any lower than $150, Bob. This is my final offer. If you're interested, it's now or never.
I understand that you're willing to sell at $150, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product.
